changelog: Added comprehensive Dashboard tab as the main view
Dashboard displays system stats (uptime, memory, version, port)
Dashboard shows newsletter statistics (emails sent, last sent, next run)
Dashboard includes real-time service status indicators for Sonarr/Radarr/Email/Trakt
Dashboard displays recent logs with auto-refresh
Added quick action buttons to Dashboard (Preview, Send Now, Configuration)
Dashboard auto-updates every 10 seconds when active
Backend now tracks total emails sent and last sent timestamp
